duties_responsibilities.duty: Responding to customer inquiries and complaints in a professional manner via phone, email, and text message.
Contacting clients to retrieve required documents and/or information.
Handling questions about company products and services, possessing detailed knowledge about the Company's products.
Ensuring full customer satisfaction, resolving problems, and following up with customers.
Learning new procedures and information in a timely manner.
Upholding the highest standard of professionalism and care when handling clients.
Answering all incoming calls, placing outgoing calls, and listening to clients' voicemails.
Upselling services or products to clients and producing all related paperwork required for clients files.
Performing other related duties as assigned by management.
Basic data entry and CRM usage.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or general education degree (GED); one to two years related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience.
